faqData.question: 1. Can I track the performance of my referral program?
faqData.answer: Yes, Ripples offers dashboards that track sales, traffic generated, and conversions for each customer sharing referral links, allowing you to monitor the success of your referral program.

faqData.question: 2. How do customers receive their rewards?
faqData.answer:
• Purchase & Share Prompt:

    After making a purchase, customers are notified via:

    • Pop-up
    • Email
    • SMS

    Encouraging them to share their purchase with friends and family.

  • Referral Success:

    When a referred friend makes a purchase, the customer earns a cash reward.

  • Reward Crediting Options:
    • The reward can be credited to the store wallet for future purchases.
    • Alternatively, it can be transferred directly to the customer's bank account.
  • Payment Process:
    • Rewards are credited after the brand's return policy period is over to ensure transaction completion.
    • For bank account transfers, Ripples processes payments weekly after the brand reviews and approves the reward amounts.

faqData.question: 3. Is it easy to set up Ripples on my ecommerce site?
faqData.answer: Yes, Ripples is designed to be easy to set up and use. With a simple app that you can integrate from your Shopify Store, you can integrate and kick start Ripples in 3 easy steps.

faqData.question: 4. What is the pricing model for Ripples?
faqData.answer: Ripples offers a pay-as-you-scale pricing model.Which is suitable for young startups & bigger companies.
